preqs: ATS1338 and ATS1339, and 12 credit points in linguistics at Level 2 units

rules.ruleString: (Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {ATS1338, ATS1339} and  Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {ATS2665, ATS2667, ATS2668, ATS2669, ATS2671, ATS2672, ATS2673, ATS2674, ATS2676, ATS2678, ATS2679, ATS2680, ATS2681, ATS2682, ATS2683})

description: The unit traces the development of child language from pre-speech to the later stages of acquisition, including the development of communicative competence. It examines the development of the child's phonological, syntactic, morphological and semantic system and attempts to account for this development by considering various linguistic models and theories.
